release.action: Fixed issue 50: Remove systematic final attributes on methods.
Fixed issue 51: Remove static attribute on commons logging logger .

Changed the cobol binding XML Schema namespace from "http://www.legsem.com/xml/ns/coxb" to "http://www.legsem.com/legstar/xml/cobol-binding-1.0.1.xsd". The new XML Schema also removed byteLength from elementary items attributes (see Issue 37).

Fixed Issue 4: There is now XML declaration specifying a UTF-8 encoding on generated mapping XML Schemas. There is also a standalone attribute that is generated depending on the input XML Schema options.

The XSD and Java Schema generators default value for the jaxbTypeClassesSuffix parameter has changed starting with 1.2.2. It used to be "Type", it is no suffix starting from now. The reason for this change is that the JAXB classes we were generating were not compatible with the one generated by third party tools.
A new j2sc Ant task takes standard Java classes as input and generates COBOL-annotated XML schemas. This is an alternative to the xsdc Ant task that takes XML schema or WSDL as input.
First version of the Complex Types Mapping Generator.
